description: This file contains integration tests for a Flutter application, verifying app navigation, UI stability, user interactions, and loading states.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A placeholder widget representing the app's home page, used in navigation and UI tests.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the application, containing core UI structure.

methods.name: _pumpEndOfFrame
methods.description: Performs a small pump to advance the UI frame, ensuring pending microtasks and rendering are completed.

methods.name: _pumpUntil
methods.description: Performs repeated pumping until a specified condition is met or a timeout occurs, used for deterministic waits.

methods.name: _waitForFinder
methods.description: Waits for a specific widget to appear in the UI within a timeout.
